All Classes

Class Description
AboutUsController
Class that handles the About Us page UI
AppController
Central Hub where all classes interact with
Board
Board is a data-only class that holds a 2-dimensional array representing the current state of a tic tac toe match.
BoardPageController
This class handles the game board page UI
BoardTest  
BoardUI
BoardUI class; handles drawing board to screen in javafx
BoardUI.UserSelectionData
Container for data to be sent out to IObservers subscribed to this class
Counter Deprecated.
no longer needed
DataValidation
Automates Validation for Strings and Objects
EventManager
Manages all Subjects and there subscribed Observers
EventSounds  
GameController
Game logic controller
GameController.DrawInfo
Container for data to be sent out to IObservers subscribed to this class
IObserver
Adds ability to get information from Subjects
ISubject
Who ever implements this can act as a server feeding info to subscribed Observers
Logger
Wrapper classes for more readable/cleaner system-wide error message logging.
LoggerTest  
Main
Tic TacToe App
MainController
Main Screen Controller class
MusicPlayer
Singleton class for app music paler
NPC  
NPC.BoardMoveInfo
The class BoardMoveInfo contains the data that should be updated in the game class using IObserver.
NPCEasyMode  
NPCEasyModeTest
Testing for NPC Easy Mode
NPCHardMode
Implementation of Homi mode for the tic tac toe AI.
NPCHardModeTest
Contains test cases for the hard mode AI.
NPCMediumMode  
Player
Player is a data-only class that holds the data pertaining to a player.
Player.MoveInfo
Container for data to be sent out to IObservers subscribed to this class
RestrictiveTextField
A text field, which restricts the user's input.
SinglePlayerController
Intermediate Screen controller class where the player can enter their name
StartController
Start page controller class
